title: navaneetha chOra
sahitya:
navanIta cOra dEvaki vasudEva nandanA vasudEva nandana yashOdana candana



anupallavi



 brndArakAddi vandita kEshava bhakta candana indIvarAyata lOcana Ananda candana 



caraNam 1



 bAluragUDi nAma smaraNa jEsukondamA bhaktula pAdadhULi manapai jhallukondamA

   

caraNam 2



 rAja rAja rAja mahA rAjashEkara rAja rAja shUra tyAgarAja shEkhara
